Reviews.Title: easy surveillance
Reviews.Author: Heidi
Reviews.Content: Just bought this system..it installed simply-all you have to do is plug into power and you're in business! The monitor is very user-friendly, completely portable, and smart.  Does everything we wanted- motion senses, records to motion, has audio also, and night vision capability. The cameras are sleek, sturdy, light-weight, and mounts anywhere.  We ordered 2 extra cameras (also come in white, so aren't easily seen under eaves) right away. So far we're extremely pleased!

ProductInfo.Name: Uniden Guardian Advanced Wireless Security System with 2 Surveillance - G766
